title: Organizational Development Practical Competency Enhancement: E-Learning-Based Sustainable Education and Human-Centered Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more technical infrastructure requirements for educational sustainability in e-learning environments.
Learners can generate examples applying humanized education principles (e.g., reflecting moral values) when designing digital learning materials.
Through focus group discussions, learners can collaboratively derive two actionable proposals for e-learning improvement with peer learners.
Learners can implement three or more effective learning engagement strategies (e.g., communication, collaboration tools) in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
